educate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to teach a child at a school, college, or university
educate.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The Ormerod School educates handicapped children.
He was educated at Bristol University.
educate.translation[0].definitions[0].no: Educate is often passive in this meaning
educate.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to give someone information about a particular subject, or to show them a better way to do something
educate.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a campaign to educate teenagers about HIV
